official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Energy to provide grants to States for the distribution of compact fluorescent lights.
short_title: Fluorescent Lightbulb Implementation Program to Save Americans Value and Energy

summary.text: Fluorescent Lightbulb Implementation Program to Save Americans Value and Energy - Instructs the Secretary of Energy to establish a program of grants to states for distribution of medium base compact fluorescent lamps to households. Requires a recipient state to give distribution priority to low-income households.
